reviews.review: i dont know why, u will keep play this game even it make u stressed xD

Too many cheats, wall hackers. Weapons movement and actions are all wrong. Maps are crap. Even the new maps are a rejig of the old ones. To be honest, its getting really boring. Yeah I said that after 1000 hours of playing.
